name: Welcome to Computer Science at REALM / Spring 2015
tagline: Intro to Python @ REALM Charter School in Berkeley, CA
body:
# Hello, World.
This class is taught by Christina Jenkins at REALM Charter High School in Berkeley. This semester-long course is an introduction to programming in Python, and will cover variables, functions, lists, loops, and conditionals. We'll do several projects along with daily exercises and weekly quizzes. 
## Unit 1: Variables, types, calculations, string operations
***
* [First day survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1rrQ3SpqsWl41ZWaspaYdKT3cWW4SMq7Ku2Qw9G0FC1w/viewform)
* Unit 1 Daily Lessons [are available here.](https://github.com/REALM-CS/python/tree/master/Unit1_Lessons_Variables)
* Unit 1 Daily Exercises [are available here.](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/Unit1_Exercises_Variables/Unit1_Exercises.ipynb)
* **Unit 1 quiz I on Friday, 1/9**: Variables, types, calculations
* **Unit 1 quiz II on Thursday, 1/15**: Variables, string operations

## Unit 2: Functions
***
* Unit 2 Daily Lessons [are available here.](https://github.com/REALM-CS/python/tree/master/Unit2_Lessons_Functions)
* Unit 2 Daily Exercises [are available here.](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/Unit2_Exercises_Functions/Unit2_Exercises.ipynb)
* Variable Scope exercises [are available here.](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/Unit2_Exercises_Functions/Variable%20Scope%20exercises.ipynb)
* Unit 1 and 2 Review Exercises [are available here.](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/Unit2_Exercises_Functions/Unit%201%2B2%20Review%20Exercises.ipynb)
* **Unit 2 quiz I on Friday, 2/6**: Functions

## Unit 3: Conditionals
***
* Unit 3 Daily Lessons [are available here.](https://github.com/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/Unit3_Lessons_Conditionals/unit3_1_conditionals.pdf)
* Unit 3 Daily Exercises [are available here.](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/Unit3_Exercises_Conditionals/Conditionals_exercises.ipynb)
* **Unit 3 quiz part I on Friday, 2/27**: Conditionals

## Unit 4: Loops!
***
* Unit 4 Exercises [are available here.](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/Unit_4_Loops/Loops_exercises.ipynb)

## Projects
***
* THE CREW! [Exercises available here.](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/The%20Crew!/Word_Problems.ipynb)
* Binary lesson [is available here. Click view raw.](https://github.com/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/binary_lesson.pdf)
* Binary worksheet [is available here. Click view raw.](https://github.com/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/binaryworksheet.pdf)
* Pig Latin lesson and challenge [is available here. Click view raw.](https://github.com/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/pig_latin.pdf)
* Rock, Paper Scissors starter code [is available here.](https://github.com/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/Unit3_Exercises_Conditionals/RPS_starter_code.py) Read the comments, please!
* Yahtzee [project description](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/Projects/Yahtzee%20Project.ipynb) and [starter code.](https://github.com/NYCiSchoolCS/think-python/blob/master/Projects/Yahtzee.py)
* Cesar Cipher problems [available here.](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/REALM-CS/python/blob/master/Projects/cesar_cipher.ipynb)
